Package population

Class Population

java.lang.Object
population.Population
public class Population extends Object
The Population class is a Singleton class with a private constructor and a static Instance of itself. Population provides a static method getInstance() to get its static instance outside the Singleton class. The Elitism methods implemented in the project acts on this only instance of population and the weaker Chromosomes are removed from this instance. New Chromosomes created in each generation is added to this same Population Instance.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ArrayList<Chromosome>
    population
    The population is a data member of the Population class which is an ArrayList of the Chromosome object.

    add(Chromosome c)
    The add() method takes a Chromosome object c as the argument and adds it to the Chromosome ArrayList in the Population instance.

    ascendingSort()
    The ascendingSort() method sorts the Population which comprises of the ArrayList of Chromosomes in the ascending order of their fitness value.
    Chromosome
    get(int index)
    The get() method takes an integer value as the argument and returns the chromosome at that index value in the Chromosome ArrayList in the Population instance.

    The select method returns the chromosome that is selected from the Population Instance using the Selection mechanism.

    The setSelection() method takes an object of the Selection class as an argument and assigns it to the selection data member of the Population class.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Population getInstance(ArrayList<Chromosome> population)
      The getInstance() method of the Population class returns the only instance of itself to the outide of the class. It used DoubleCheckedLocking mechanism for Object creation. A local variable result is assigned the static volatile instance 'p' of the Population ' class to check if the instance is null to improve performance since checking the static volatile instance is expensive in terms of resource utilization.
      Parameters:
      population -
      Returns:
      result (Stores the static volatile instance p of Population class)

    • setSelection

      public void setSelection(Selection selection)
      The setSelection() method takes an object of the Selection class as an argument and assigns it to the selection data member of the Population class.
      Parameters:
      selection -

    • getSelectionName

      public String getSelectionName()
      The getSelectionName() method returns the type of Selection strategy used at the time being for the Chromosome selection.
      Returns:

    • performElitism

      public void performElitism()
      The performElitism() method uses the value of ELITISM_RATE and POPULATION static variable in the Utilities class to determine the percentage of population (No. of Chromosomes) to be removed from the Population instance.
